body.name: Cuisinart Coffee Maker, 12-Cup Glass Carafe, Automatic Hot & Iced Coffee Maker, Single Server Brewer, Navy Blue, SS-16
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 2 mins.
features: SINGLE-SERVE: Enjoy five serving sizes – 4 ounces, 6 ounces, 8 ounces, 10 ounces or 12 ounces – compatible with any brand of single cup pod with an optional reusable filter cup so you can use your own coffee through our HomeBarista elite Cuisinart features - pour it over ice for a cool coffee treat.Filter type:Reusable

SUPERIOR FUNCTIONALITY: The Extreme Brew features delivers coffee up to 25% faster and our single-serve brewer has a 42oz removable water reservoir and flip down shelf for shorter mugs - No need for paper filters as it comes with our reusable gold tone, commercial-style filter

CARAFE BREWER: Serve up to 12 cups of coffee at once with our glass carafe coffee maker featuring a stainless-steel handle and body with fully automatic features – 24-hour brew start, self-clean, auto-off, and ready alert system

MUST-HAVE FEATURES: Our 12-cup coffee brewer allows you to control your brew strength so you can boast light to strong coffee flavor as well as adjust your carafe water temperature that runs through its charcoal water filter
SIMPLIFY YOUR MORNING: Fill your tank with ease featuring our easy-view water window and pour a cup before your brew cycle ends with our Brew Pause feature
body.description: Drip or pod, hot or iced, single cup or carafe for 12—get your coffee, your way with the Cuisinart 2-in-1 Coffeemaker. This kitchen essential for coffee lovers takes home brewing to another level by combining 12-cup carafe and single-serve options in one convenient unit. Brew a full pot 25% faster with Extreme Brew technology. Customize when and how you want your coffee with advanced start, Brew Pause, temperature control, auto-off, and bold flavor settings. Instantly brew a single serving of hot coffee in 5 cup sizes with any pod, or the reusable HomeBarista filter. Or brew over ice for delicious coffee that refreshes! Experience complete brewing versatility and customizable convenience, courtesy of Cuisinart!

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Extreme Brew® feature, Gold tone, commercial-style, permanent filter, Fully automatic, Brew Strength Control, Brew Pause™ feature, Charcoal Water Filter See more

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice - overall very pleased!
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with all the features, it will make you read a paragraph or 2 but no big deal. The coffee is super hot w/3 heat settings, the hot runs basically 165 degrees so we run it medium heat. I like the "all pod" option and a very large removeable cup reservoir. A little pricy but way better then our original Kuerig & Cusinart we just trashed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy!
reviews.reviewText: We enjoy the craft side of this coffee machine. We have had major issues with the pod side. Each time we use it, since the first time, it overflows and grounds get all in the cup of coffee and also all in and around the machine. It is a pain to clean the grounds out of the machine because no parts come out to clean, you just have to wipe inside and around until all the grounds are gone, this is very time consuming. Also when I contacted Cuisinart customer service I do not think their return policy is fair. They want me to cut the cord to the machine, take a picture of this, send back the machine and then wait 2 weeks for the replacement, therefore we would be without a coffee pot for two weeks because they sell a faulty product? If I have to go out and get a new coffee pot I’m going to buy a new one and not waste 200$ on one that doesn’t work well. I asked if they could charge me for the new one, ship it and then refund me when they get my broken one back, so we can use the craft side in the mean time, so we don’t have to be without one. They told me no, and I will have to go without and wait for the replacement. Seems strange, I asked why they operate this way and they responded, “we have alot of fraud and don’t trust customers to return the products”. Well welcome to the world, everyone deals with fraud, unfortunately part of owning a company is making the customer happy and standing behind your product. Very disappointed in this company and the product quality. Do not buy this machine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this for about a month and I am happy so far. The carafe is big if we need to make a lot of coffee. But having the option of making one cup only is great, that is the side we use most. The built in filters that comes with each side saves me money from not needing to buy filters and I get to use the same coffee for both sides. No need to buy individual pods, which can add up $$. The water reservoir holds enough for multiple cups and is easy to detach so you can fill it. The instructions are easy to read. The display is very nice and modern. It makes hot and cold coffee and we use both options. The one thing I did not account for is the height of the machine. My cabinet on top does not allow me to fully open the lid on the right side. The machine is too tall and I do not have enough space between the top and bottom cabinets. That was my fault though, as I should have measured. I recommend measuring your space before you buy. You will need about a foot of space between the top of the machine and the top cabinet to fully lift the lid up. This is only an issue for the side of the carafe not the single cup that takes pods. That side works fine as it is a smaller lid that does not take up as much space. That is the only inconvenience I have with this machine. But it is not a reason for me to return it. I feel like happy with this purchase and have gotten compliments on it from family members who visit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars POD FEATURE DOES NOT WORK **UPDATED**
reviews.reviewText: I love this coffee maker, however the POD feature is broken. Tried all the troubleshooting options. POD feature is defective. I'm sending this back for a replacement.**UPDATED 1.10.24** - received the replacement and again the POD button would not turn on. After trying several options, there is a button that I pushed, and suddenly the POD button started working. See photo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dual coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was searching for a coffee pot that offered both a K Cup option as well as traditional coffee pot style. I have previously been happy with Cuisinart coffee makers, so when I saw this one I ordered it. I love this coffee pot and would recommend this for anyone looking for a dual purpose coffee pot. This coffee pot offers the option to have your coffee on a timer which I love because I make my coffee the night before and set the auto brew so it's ready when I wake up. The K Cup side offers easy to clean removable pieces as well as a removable water canister to make it easy to add more water. Also to add, my kids love using hot chocolate k cups too. This is an all around great coffee pot. I am overall very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this coffeemaker
reviews.reviewText: After years of having Keurig machines I wanted to go back to making real coffee. I had forgotten how good real coffee tastes! I grind my own beans. The machine is easy to use, I usually make a half pot in the morning. The warming plate has different settings and I find Medium keeps it just the right temperature. If I want a cup of decaf in the afternoon I use the single cup side. Having options is great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Sorry I bought it
reviews.reviewText: I hate to leave a bad review about a Cuisinart product. I've purchased many of them, including the pod only machine, and the combo unit that was the previous version of this one.I was super excited that this newer machine had the pod dispenser on the left side (the old one had it on the right side), it works better for my counter set up.The older machine didn't poop out, I just moved it to my office to make room for the new one.Here's the problem: The coffeepot dispenser worked fine, it was the pod dispenser that didn't work very well. I can't tell what the actual problem was, it seemed to work better if I stood there and pushed down on the pop up pod door. Even then it would leak water around the pod into the cup (if it actually dispensed some coffee), sometimes it would dispense only vaguely brown water - and made a crap load of noise doing it.It makes me really annoyed to ditch a machine after so little time, but I will be tossing it - because it takes up too much room to keep it for the coffee pot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pairs well in my kitchen w/ my other appliances. It makes a Great Pot of Coffee and the same for a Cup. You control your desired ounces of water per cup, also takes pods of coffee, if that’s your choice. It’s Fast, Hot and Delicious. It’s Everything I Needed.Great work Cuisinart!
Works great when I’m too tired in the morning. Don’t have to think too hard before my coffee which I like. Stick a pod in and get your coffee in less than a minute or make a pot, awesome.
L'eau est chaude et le breuvage se conserve longtemps.

I was aware of the pod button issues reported by some users, but I still hoped to get lucky with mine. Unfortunately, that wasn't the case. While the carafe side worked fine, the pod button simply wouldn't function. I tried pressing and holding the button, unplugging the machine, inserting a Keurig cup, but nothing worked. I even tried calling Cuisinart customer service, but after waiting for 20 minutes, I was hung up on. It's a real shame since the machine looks great, but based on my experience, I wouldn't recommend it.
Product defective, pod function not working.
